func.title: Bubble

param.name: x
param.desc: X position of the bubble. Offset in local calls.

param.name: y
param.desc: Y position of the bubble. Offset in local calls.

func.remark: The maximum number of bubbles simultaneously present in a game depends on the smoke level configuration. In network games, this value is forced to 150.

example.text: Creates a bubble at the calling object.
